Rodimus looked at Tuscon nodd=
ing, "There are two Primes now, those
Predacons will never know what hit th=
em." His words were firm and no
nonsense. "But we need more information on =
those insects before we go
attacking them."

Rodimus got a thoughtful expre=
ssion on his face, "I seem to have the
impression that the insects were old=

could feel that they are a race that is =
nearly as old as the
transformers, but thier form was not always an insect =

> He opens his chest and reveals his pulsating=

=

ff of compassion, hope, understanding, and kindness. The power of unity, an=
d a simple force that we all possess to a level of degree. It's what drew R=

>

 smiles as her own heart spark beats within her chest.

tely something our enemy doesn't have. And there's no other force greater t=
han that."

." he said
gravely, "But that will not help here. Her problem is in her spa=
rk.
That has the power to heal her physically, but not to restore her lost
